org.vadere.gui.components.model

Class DefaultModel<T extends DefaultConfig>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • org.vadere.gui.components.model.DefaultModel<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<ScenarioElement>, IDefaultModel<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimulationModel, TopographyCreatorModel

    public abstract class DefaultModel<T extends DefaultConfig>
extends java.util.Observable
implements IDefaultModel<T>

      • getGridResolution

        public double getGridResolution()
        Description copied from interface: IDefaultModel
        Return the grid resolution. The grid resolution is responsible for the refinement of the displayed grid. If the scale factor is large, the grid resolution shall be small.
        Specified by:
        getGridResolution in interface IDefaultModel<T extends DefaultConfig>
        Returns:
        the grid resolution
